title: Agri-Llama
description: Specialized LLM optimized for Bengali agricultural queries on 2GB RAM devices. 70% size reduction with zero performance loss.

title: Krishok AI
description: AI-powered agricultural platform with Bengali voice interaction and computer vision for disease diagnosis.

title: PersonaPlex AI
description: Real-time speech-to-speech AI model for high-fidelity vocal interaction with LLMs.

title: Pocket Chef AI
description: Smart recipe management system with computer vision for ingredient recognition. Features automated deployment pipelines, secure API architecture, and AI-driven meal planning.

title: MChat Offline LLM
description: Android application bringing local LLM capabilities to mobile using llama.cpp and Gemini Nano architectures.

title: Echo AI
description: A local, GPU-accelerated digital twin platform combining RAG with Gemma 3 4B. Privacy-focused AI that knows you through your documents.

title: Porua / Porua.org
description: Piracy-proof eBook platform with high-level encryption and internal multi-vendor ecosystem.

title: Danesh Exchange
description: Multi-currency banking solution for the Australian market. Implemented AES-256 encryption and root detection.

title: HOMEFOODZ
description: Banglalink IT Incubator 2.0 Champion. A scalable marketplace platform for home-based entrepreneurs to digitize their business.

title: E-PARKING
description: BASIS National ICT Award Winner. A dual-app marketplace (User/Provider) for renting private parking spaces via QR code scanning. Turn any home or office space into a smart parking spot.

title: A.I. Wall-E Specialist
description: A Wall-E inspired intelligent robot featuring advanced computer vision for object recognition and text-to-speech. Controlled via a secure Android app with voice commands, tilt-to-drive gyroscope navigation, and autonomous entertainment modes.
